main event: A bright, blue-white object was observed moving quickly across the horizon at McClellan AFB, California.
interesting points: The object appeared to be about the same size as a star or planet, but much brighter.
The object moved across the sky too swiftly for any known aircraft.
The object suddenly disappeared after slightly brightening.
The sighting was reported by the pilot and flight engineer of an EC-121D aircraft at 15,000 feet.
The observers estimated the object's speed to be around 18,000 mph.
witnesses: pilot and flight engineer of an EC-121D aircraft
